channel.title: [PI] Currecting PM and CC Icons [PI]
channel.description: On my source, when donators use PM or CC they have no icon, when mods use PM or CC they have the donator icon and when admins use PM or CC they have mod icons. Where can i fix this? i have looked through PrivateMessaging.java and could not find the fix... please help.

item.title: [PI] Currecting PM and CC Icons [PI]
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
